trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around September 13th 2003
divs: Sighting Details1. driving on interstate 59 south 2. 3 bright lights in sky far off 3. tower or airplane 4. excited, nervous, shock 5. as we got closer it was hovering over interstate exit to carraway blvd and red light in middle was flashing 6. while exiting on carraway blvd object disappeared and never seen again
